name: KALQL8TR
description:
This is a Mathlike, a Roguelike that uses maths for combat.

You can either use the numpad on your keyboard or the on-screen user interface to control the game. All actions in the game will cost you HP, and you can regain HP by fighting the monsters. You can only defeat the monsters by using the calculator to create a result that matches the number on the monster. Getting the result with certain operators will give you a larger health boost!

Developed for the 7DRL Challenge 2020.

Sound effects by Richard Devine.
